M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main.GraphicsMain
This method is used to load the GameFrame into the event queue.
Main - package Main
 
makeAllLevel(Rectangle, int[][], int, int) - Method in class Main.GameBoard
This method controls the generation for all the custom levels and returns an array of Bricks for a custom level.
makeBrick(Point, Dimension, int) - Method in class Main.GameBoard
This method is used to create a brick of a certain type with a given size at a given point.
makeButton(String, ActionListener) - Method in class Main.DebugPanel
This method is used to add the given string to the JButton and to add action listeners to the JButtons.
makeChessboardLevel(Rectangle, int, int, int) - Method in class Main.GameBoard
This method is used to generate an array of 31 bricks in 3 lines.
makeComboBox(String[]) - Method in class Main.CustomPanel
This method is used to make JComboBoxes with the given array of strings as their options.
makeCrack(Point2D, int, Brick) - Method in class Main.GameBoardController
This method creates a crack from the impact point in the given direction.
makeCrack(Point, Point, Brick) - Method in class Main.GameBoardController
This method creates a crack from the impact point to the randomly selected end point.
makeCustomLevels(Rectangle, int[][]) - Method in class Main.GameBoard
This method is used to create 5 levels to be loaded into the game.
makeDefaultLevels(Rectangle) - Method in class Main.GameBoard
This method creates the 5 default levels and loads them into a double array of Bricks.
makeJButton(String) - Method in class Main.CustomPanel
This method is used to make JButtons with the given string as their label.
makeJLabels(String) - Method in class Main.CustomPanel
This method is used to make JLabels with the given string as their label and adds it to the CustomPanel.
makeLabels(String) - Method in class Main.CustomPanel
This method is used to make JLabels with the given string as their label which will change according to the choices by the player.
makeLabels(String, GridBagConstraints, int) - Method in class Main.InfoScreen
This method creates JLabels with text which are loaded into a JPanel which is then loaded into a JScrollPane.
makeRandomPoint(Point, Point, int) - Method in class Main.GameBoardController
This method selects a random point between 2 points in a given direction to generate the crack.
makeSingleTypeLevel(Rectangle) - Method in class Main.GameBoard
This method is used to generate an array of 31 bricks in 3 lines, all of which are the same type.
makeSlider(ChangeListener) - Method in class Main.DebugPanel
This method is used to make JSliders with the given min and max values and to add action listeners to the JSliders.
manageBrick() - Method in class Main.CustomPanel
The JComboBox brick types available for selection are reset every time the number of brick types is changed.
max - Variable in class Main.Player
The max position of the player on the screen.
